TopicTitle: Precision controls on PS4 Enhanced Edition?

Articles.Content:
I've played a lot of KSP on the PC, but not much on the PS4 which I generally prefer for gaming. I downloaded the new version for my PS4 and have been having fun with it except that I can't seem to find any way to activate precision controls for flying. 

This would be the caplock on a PC, but I don't see any mention of it on the console version. Is that feature missing, undocumented, or am I just too blind to see it?

I'm really enjoying flying with the controller compared to KB, but find it a little twitchy for some stuff.

In cursor control sheme it is 

LB+LS ( L1+L3 )

These "Precision Mode" as described in the ingame Kerpedia,

however the Vessel seems to not steer at all in this mode.
